subject: Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: Miami quarterback Trent Green was placed on injured reserve yesterday, knocking him out for the rest of the season after his second severe concussion in 13 months. Green, 37, said he had made no decision about playing next season. A series of test results were normal after the latest injury, sustained Oct. 7, but doctors were concerned about possible long-term effects and declined to clear him to play.
